entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned by Dobby and recognized by Harry.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is aware of Draco Malfoy's activities and tries to inform Harry.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A student who is sneaking off to the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who provides insight into the magic of the Room of Requirement.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is trying to understand the situation.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: A secret room that can only be accessed by those who need it and is used by Draco Malfoy.

relationships.description: Harry is aware that Draco Malfoy has been sneaking off to the Room of Requirement.
